prs.title: Added 3 new devices
prs.body:
2 New devices added

1st Luminance door sensor - _TZE200_pay2byax / TS0601
2nd Smart Button switch _TZ3000_mrpevh8p / TS0041

issues.title: Device Request - Roller Shutter Switch - _TZE284_uqfph8ah / TS0601
Feature Request - Mired /white level adjustment
issues.body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem or is it a nice addition? Please describe.**
Some devices do have wrong white values. e.g. the mood light from lidl can be much more warm white when paired directly to homey then through the app. 

**Describe the solution you'd like**

A Advanced setting where you can adjust the mireds, Prefilled with the current value read from the device itself

**Describe alternatives you've considered**

The alternative is to pair the devices as a basic zigbee device but that is a hassle with constanly disabling the Tuya zigbee app

**Additional context**

Feel free to connect to investigate this further
